member.name: M:WordPredictor.Predictor.nextWordDistribution(System.String)
member.summary: Given the previous word, returns a word probability distribution the next word. Should be called once for each word in a sequence.

member.name: M:WordPredictor.Scorer.score(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpMap{System.String,System.Double},System.String)
member.summary: Computes a score when given the predicted word probability distribution and the correct word.

member.name: M:WordPredictor.Scorer.predictorScore(WordPredictor.Predictor,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Computes the average score for a Predictor across a sequence of words.

member.name: T:WordPredictor.Scorer
member.summary: Scores a Predictor on how well it predicts words in a given sequence.

member.name: M:WordPredictor.WikipediaParser.htmlToWordSeq(FSharp.Data.HtmlDocument)
member.summary: Extract the words from the main content of a wikipedia article.
